name: Biorhythm
description:
biorhythm is a rhythmic infection game, set to the beat of the heart. you play as lonely bacteria, lost in the human bloodstream. explore, fight, and uncover the mystery of your new home!

it features beautiful hand-painted art & an orchestral score.

  • grow a swarm of bacteria and explore the human body at a microscopic scale
  • encounter strange microbes & fearsome white blood cells
  • try your best to be good and not to hurt anyone

created by Brady Soglin. art by Anna Cich & Jackie Lombard. sounds by Dylan Payne & Bobby Volpendesta.
